item.title: What Happens to People Who Move to the Beach? A Massive New Study Shows an Unexpected Benefit
item.description: ‘We were surprised to find such a significant and clear difference.’

item.title: Detroit Is Offering $700,000 in Grants to Companies Willing to Relocate to the City
item.description: The new program aims to attract tech founders to the Motor City. But can money alone overcome the gravitational pull of the costs?

item.title: Sen. Josh Hawley Wants to Send Out $600 Tariff Rebate Checks. Experts Say There Is Just 1 Catch
item.description: Rebates sound great on paper. But it could have unintended consequences for the economy.

item.title: Who Is Julian Brown?
item.description: Online social media users are speculating that Brown, the inventor of a machine that turns plastic into fuel, has gone missing.

item.title: Watch This Unicorn Company’s Humanoid Robots Complete Helpful Tasks
item.description: Amazon-backed Skild AI has unveiled a general-purpose AI model for robots that could venture beyond the factory floor.
